comments.body: i thought we were going to use a Java enum? how do you use the enums in Java? I thought we were going to use Java enum which is usable for both.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@

+package org.apache.spark.sql.sources
+
+/**
+  * SaveMode is used to specify the expected behavior of saving a DataFrame to a data source.
+  */
+abstract class SaveMode {
+
+}
+
+/**
+  * Append mode means that when saving a DataFrame to a data source, if data already exists,
+  * contents of the DataFrame are expected to be appended to existing data.
+  *
+  * Please use the singleton [[SaveModes.Append]].
+  */
